testCases.name: User Login Functionality
testCases.description: Verify that users with different roles (Admin, Staff, Customer) can log in successfully.
testCases.expectedOutcome: Users are authenticated and redirected to their respective dashboards based on role.
testCases.failureCondition: Login fails with valid credentials or user is redirected to the wrong dashboard.

testCases.name: User Registration Functionality
testCases.description: Verify that a new user can successfully register an account.
steps: Fill in valid user details (Name, Email, Password)
Verify success message or redirection to login/dashboard
Verify the new user exists in the database
testCases.expectedOutcome: New user account is created and can log in.
testCases.failureCondition: Registration fails or user cannot log in after registration.

testCases.name: Forgot Password Flow
testCases.description: Verify the password recovery process.
steps: Verify success message about email instructions
testCases.expectedOutcome: System accepts the request and initiates the password reset flow.
testCases.failureCondition: Form submission fails or valid email is rejected.

testCases.name: Service Catalog Browsing
testCases.description: Verify that services are displayed correctly from the database.
steps: Check if categories (e.g., Business Printing, Signage) are visible
Click on a category to filter services
Select a specific service (e.g., Business Cards)
Verify service details, options (Quantity, Finish), and pricing are displayed
testCases.expectedOutcome: Service catalog is populated with data from the 'services' table and options are interactive.
testCases.failureCondition: Services page is empty or service details do not match the seed data.

testCases.name: Quote Request Process
testCases.description: Test the end-to-end flow of a customer requesting a quote.
steps: Configure service options (e.g., 500 count, Matte finish)
Verify the new quote appears with status 'SUBMITTED'
testCases.expectedOutcome: Quote is successfully created in the 'quotes' table and visible in the customer dashboard.
testCases.failureCondition: Quote submission fails or the created quote is not listed.

testCases.name: Customer Dashboard Loading
testCases.description: Verify the customer dashboard loads with correct user data.
testCases.expectedOutcome: Dashboard renders without errors and displays data relevant to the logged-in user.
testCases.failureCondition: Dashboard crashes or displays empty/incorrect data.

testCases.name: Customer Order History
testCases.description: Verify customers can view their past orders.
steps: Verify the list includes past orders
testCases.expectedOutcome: List of orders is displayed correctly.
testCases.failureCondition: Order list is empty (when orders exist) or throws an error.

testCases.name: Customer Order Detail View
testCases.description: Verify detailed view of a specific order.
steps: Click on a specific order ID
Verify order items, pricing, and status details
Check for invoice download option (if applicable)
testCases.expectedOutcome: Order details page loads with correct specific information.
testCases.failureCondition: Page fails to load or shows mismatched data.

testCases.name: Customer Booking Calendar
testCases.description: Verify customers can view and book appointments.
testCases.expectedOutcome: Booking is successfully created and slot is reserved.
testCases.failureCondition: Booking submission fails or calendar does not load.

testCases.name: Customer Account Settings
testCases.description: Verify customers can update their profile information.
testCases.expectedOutcome: Profile changes are saved to the database.
testCases.failureCondition: Update fails or data reverts on reload.

testCases.name: Admin Dashboard Overview
testCases.description: Verify admin dashboard key metrics.
testCases.expectedOutcome: Admin dashboard displays aggregated business data.
testCases.failureCondition: Widgets fail to load data or show server errors.

testCases.name: Admin User Management
testCases.description: Verify admin can manage user accounts.
steps: Edit user role or status (e.g., deactive)
testCases.expectedOutcome: Admin can successfully search and simple edit user properties.
testCases.failureCondition: User list fails to load or edits are not saved.

testCases.name: Admin Service Management
testCases.description: Verify admin can manage service catalog.
steps: Add a new service or edit existing one
Verify change is reflected on public Services page
testCases.expectedOutcome: Catalog updates are persisted and public-facing.
testCases.failureCondition: Save operation fails.

testCases.name: Admin Orders Manager (List)
testCases.description: Verify admin can view and filter the orders list.
testCases.expectedOutcome: Orders list filters correctly and displays relevant orders.
testCases.failureCondition: Filtering fails or list is empty.

testCases.name: Admin Order Processing
testCases.description: Verify admin can process individual orders.
testCases.expectedOutcome: Order state is updated comprehensively.
testCases.failureCondition: Status update or staff assignment fails.

testCases.name: Admin Quote Finalization
testCases.description: Verify admin can review and finalize quotes.
steps: Verify quote status updates to 'Awaiting Approval'
testCases.expectedOutcome: Quote is correctly priced and sent back to customer.
testCases.failureCondition: Cannot finalize quote or send email.

testCases.name: Admin Content & Gallery
testCases.description: Verify admin can manage website content.
steps: Navigate to Gallery Manager / Content Manager
testCases.expectedOutcome: New content is added to the public gallery.
testCases.failureCondition: Upload fails or content doesn't appear.

testCases.name: Admin Tier Management
testCases.description: Verify admin can manage pricing tiers.
steps: Edit features of a tier (e.g. Gold Package)
Verify changes on public Pricing page
testCases.expectedOutcome: Tier configuration is updated.
testCases.failureCondition: Update fails.

testCases.name: Staff Job Queue
testCases.description: Verify staff can see assigned tasks.
steps: Verify list of assigned production jobs
Mark a job item as complete
testCases.expectedOutcome: Staff sees relevant jobs and can update item status.
testCases.failureCondition: Job queue is empty or updates fail.

testCases.name: Staff Job Execution
testCases.description: Verify staff can work on a specific job detail.
steps: Navigate to a specific Job ID
Log time or add production notes
testCases.expectedOutcome: Job details are accessible and updates are saved.
testCases.failureCondition: Cannot access job files or save notes.

testCases.name: Staff Schedule View
testCases.description: Verify staff can view the production calendar.
steps: View scheduled installations or massive print jobs
testCases.expectedOutcome: Calendar renders with production events.
testCases.failureCondition: Calendar is blank.

testCases.name: Public Contact Form
testCases.description: Verify public inquiry form.
steps: Check Admin/Staff dashboard for new inquiry (optional)
testCases.expectedOutcome: Form submits without error.
testCases.failureCondition: Submission fails validation or network error.

testCases.name: Public Pricing Visibility
testCases.description: Verify general pricing information is accessible.
testCases.expectedOutcome: Pricing information is visible.
testCases.failureCondition: Page is empty.

testCases.name: Responsive UI Test
testCases.description: Ensure the application layout adapts to mobile and desktop screens.
steps: Resize browser window to mobile width (< 768px)
Verify navigation menu collapses into a hamburger menu
Check that product cards stack vertically
Ensure no horizontal scrolling is required for content
testCases.expectedOutcome: UI adapts fluidly between breakpoints without breaking layout or functionality.

testCases.name: Gallery Content Verification
testCases.description: Verify that the gallery displays images and descriptions.
steps: Verify that multiple images are loaded
Check for titles and descriptions (e.g., 'Premium Business Cards')
Click on an image to view details or larger version
testCases.expectedOutcome: Gallery is populated with seed data images and text.

testCases.name: Inventory Dashboard (Adv)
testCases.description: Verify inventory overview logic.
testCases.expectedOutcome: Inventory levels are displayed.
testCases.failureCondition: Dashboard fails to load inventory data.

testCases.name: Procurement / Purchase Orders
testCases.description: Verify purchase order generation.
steps: Create new PO for a supplier
testCases.expectedOutcome: PO is created.
testCases.failureCondition: Creation fails.

testCases.name: B2B Account Management (Adv)
testCases.description: Verify B2B specific features.
steps: Verify specific pricing or contract details
testCases.expectedOutcome: B2B specific data is accessible.
testCases.failureCondition: B2B section is inaccessible or empty.
